subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador leads the Giro d’Italia by 4 minutes 2 seconds. Mikel Landa posted his second consecutive stage victory.
snippet: Alberto Contador leads the Giro d’Italia by 4 minutes 2 seconds. Mikel Landa posted his second consecutive stage victory.
